biotools.summary: Tool that utilizes Position Weight Matrices to search for putative Transcription Factor Binding Sites. PMSearch takes Position Frequency Matrices (PFMs) and DNA sequences to initiate a prediction task. The user may upload motifs/matrices (Position Frequency Matrices, PFM or Position Weight Matrices, PWM) or retrieve PFMs from our local dataset as input.

bioschemas.name: PMSearch
